Catering Min Delivery: 10.00 User Reviews
Sky Chop Suey Posted by A Regular on 02/03/2012
I'm a regular
I order food from Sky about once a week. The food is made to order, so they are not a typical fast food restaurant, ie not fast, but if you call ahead like I do, you don't have to sit around and wait. They also deliver, which I love when I don't want to leave the house. Sky Chop Suey Posted by Chicago Lady21 on 12/06/2011
Downhill
This place has definitely went down hill. The rice is dry,service is extremely slow even when your the only one in the restaurant. And the prices have went up. The quality is not worth the amount for the product, that they're serving now for ten+ years I've known and ate at this restaurant, since tastebuds was next door. Sky Chop Suey Posted by Alley Oop on 09/15/2011
Simply The Best
I pass ten other Chinese take places between my house and trhis place. It is simply the best tasting Chinese food take out on the southwest side of Chicago! Sky Chop Suey Posted by N. Cannon on 04/07/2009
The ONLY Chineese Spot for me!
I travel from the east side for this food! This is THE BEST as far as fast food spots go. I thoroughly recommend you try it if you are in the mood and in the area. Sky Chop Suey Posted by Vada Laylene on 03/30/2009
THIS IS MY SPOT! LOL
I've been eating at this place for years and, normally, I do delivery. They have pretty good food and the delivery is pretty fast, depending how far you stay. The employees are courteous and do their best to make sure that the customers are satisfied. If you're around the area and craving Cantonese/Chinese food, then I higly recommend this place. Sky Chop Suey Posted by Yolanda on 05/17/2007
If you want good chinese food this is it
The food in this establishment is actually very good. The service is good depending on how crowded it is, they are not the fastest but it is worth the wait. The atmosphere is that of a fast food restaurant not bad. Save 10% by faxing your order to them:)
1
